article: hours before the latest thunderstorms settled over the pga tour and hurtled enough rain to wash out thursday 's first round of the bellsouth classic , ian woosnam settled into a chair and explained how a weather delay disrupts a golfer 's flow .
abstract: in early going this year the pga tour is all wet
